thread.title: Cool Hotel with a great location.
thread.title_full: Cool Hotel with a great location. - Review of Hotel Elysees 8, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Dollos
title: Cool Hotel with a great location.
text:
Booked into Hotel Elysees 8 for a night over in Paris. Great hotel in a brilliant location. Very friendly staff upon arrival and throughuot duration. room was laid out in a very modern and cool style, very comfortable bed and shower was great. I would like another opportunity to stay at this hotel for a longer period.
Room Tip: Room 103 was mine and I would ask for it again. See more room tips
